title: How to Make a Kryptonite Drink

steps.headline: Pour the spiced rum into a cocktail shaker.
Pour the coconut rum into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the melon liquor into the cocktail shaker.
Pour the pineapple juice into the cocktail shaker.
Add a splash of Bacardi rum into the cocktail shaker.

text: Pour the spiced rum into a cocktail shaker.  Pour the coconut rum into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the melon liquor into the cocktail shaker.  Pour the pineapple juice into the cocktail shaker.  Add a splash of Bacardi rum into the cocktail shaker.  Shake well.  Strain into a cocktail glass. Serve.
